Heading: The robotic arm moved unexpectedly
Observation: The robotic arm of the assembly department B was activated in the middle of maintenance work without warning. Fortunately, the maintenance man had just left the safety zone.

Heading: Strong smell of hydraulic oil
Observation: There was a strong smell of oil near the hydraulic unit of assembly B. A small leak in the system is suspected.

Heading: Compressed air condensate on the floor
Observation: Condensate had leaked from the discharge valve of the compressed air line in assembly department B onto the floor, creating a slipping hazard.

Heading: Pallets stacked dangerously high
Observation: In the intermediate warehouse of Ward B, the pallets were stacked to a height of more than three metres without a support structure.

Heading: The temperature sensor displays incorrectly
Observation: The temperature sensor in configuration B showed -5°C, even though the room was clearly at normal room temperature.

Heading: Reduced airflow in the fume cupboard
Observation: The airflow in the fume cupboard of compartment B had deteriorated significantly. The smoke test showed insufficient suction power.

Heading: The roller track gets stuck randomly
Observation: The conveyor roller conveyor of assembly B stops randomly for no apparent reason, causing production interruptions.

Heading: Refrigeration unit door frozen shut
Observation: The door of the refrigeration unit of ward B had frozen shut and required a violent opening.

Heading: Pressure Relief Valve Leak
Observation: The pressure relief valve in Assembly Compartment B is leaking and making a hissing noise.

Heading: Laser cutter safety glasses lost
Observation: The safety glasses of the laser workstation in ward B had disappeared and spare glasses were not available.

Heading: Cart's wheel stuck
Observation: One wheel of the transport trolley used in configuration B is jammed and the trolley is running at an angle.

Heading: Vacuum cleaner overheated
Observation: The industrial vacuum cleaner in Ward B shut down due to overheating in the middle of use.

Heading: Sensor system gives false alarms
Observation: The safety sensor system in Configuration B gives repeated false alarms, stopping production.

Heading: Chemical leakage from a small container
Observation: In ward B, a small container of solvent had fallen over and the contents had spilled under the worktop.

Heading: Lifting rope frayed
Observation: The lifting rope of Assembly Detachment B was frayed in several places and required immediate replacement.

Heading: Condensation dripping from the air conditioning duct
Observation: Water drips directly from the ventilation duct of ward B to the workstation.

Heading: Welding gas cylinder valve leaks
Observation: At the welding point of assembly B, the valve of the gas cylinder is leaking noticeably.

Heading: The roller conveyor causes vibrations
Observation: The roller conveyor in ward B causes strong vibrations that can be felt throughout the hall.

Heading: The warning light does not work
Observation: The rotating warning light in Assembly Compartment B no longer works at all.

Heading: The epoxy on the floor is peeling off
Observation: The epoxy coating on the floor of ward B flakes off over large areas, exposing the concrete.

Heading: Air Force Gun Trigger Stuck
Observation: The trigger of the air blow gun used in Assembly B got stuck, causing a continuous jet of air.

Heading: The electric motor smells like burnt smell
Observation: The engine of the conveyor system in ward B smelled of burnt smell during operation.

Heading: Workwear storage cabinet full
Observation: The workwear storage cabinet in assembly department B is full and some of the clothes are on the floor.

Heading: The water in the emergency shower does not flow
Observation: During the testing of the emergency shower in ward B, it was found that the water does not flow at sufficient pressure.

Heading: Robot cell does not recognize components
Observation: The robot cell in configuration B does not recognize the components due to a malfunction in the vision system.

Heading: Tear in the floor
Observation: A tear of about 30 cm has formed in the floor of ward B, which can be tripped over.

Heading: Leakage of the quick coupling of the compressed air hose
Observation: The quick coupling of the compressed air hose in assembly department B is constantly leaking air.

Heading: Conveyor belt slides
Observation: The conveyor belt in compartment B slides over the rollers, causing uneven transport.

Heading: The workstation lamp flickers
Observation: The LED light at the workstation in Configuration B flickers disturbingly.

Heading: The angle grinder vibrates strongly
Observation: The angle grinder in Compartment B vibrates abnormally strongly in use.

Heading: Air purifier filter clogged
Observation: The air purifier filter in Assembly Compartment B is completely clogged with dust.

Heading: Operating instructions for the lifting device have been lost
Observation: The operating instructions for the lifting device of Ward B have disappeared, and it was not possible to familiarize the new person.

Heading: Underfloor heating does not work
Observation: The underfloor heating in Configuration B does not work and the floor is cold.

Heading: Tool trolley overturned
Observation: In ward B, a tool trolley fell over when it was moved on an uneven floor.

Heading: The pressure gauge shows zero
Observation: The pressure gauge on the hydraulic pump in assembly department B shows zero even though the system is running.

Heading: Torn protective curtain
Observation: The protective curtain of the welding point of ward B has torn in several places.

Heading: Warning tape detached
Observation: The warning tape for the hazardous area of Assembly B had come off the floor.

Heading: Compressed air hose whips
Observation: In ward B, the compressed air hose came loose and began to whip dangerously around.

Heading: Hook safety lock broken
Observation: The safety lock on the lifting hook in Assembly Section B no longer works.

Heading: Workstation suction system blocked
Observation: The suction system of the workstation in ward B is clogged and no longer suction at all.

Heading: The floor drain smells
Observation: An unpleasant smell comes from the floor drain in assembly B.

Heading: The roller track goes too fast
Observation: The speed of the roller conveyor in section B has increased and the components fall off easily.

Heading: Emergency stop circuit does not work
Observation: The emergency stop circuit of Assembly Detachment B did not stop the plane during the test.

Heading: The desk at the workstation wobbles
Observation: The desk at the workstation in Ward B wobbles dangerously and threatens to fall over.

Heading: The compressed air dryer does not work
Observation: Assembly B's compressed air dryer is out of order and there is moisture in the air.

Heading: The conveyor scale shows the wrong
Observation: The conveyor scale in section B constantly shows a weight that is 5 kg too light.
